name: Rent A Car Simulator 24: Prologue
description:
This Prologue is a limited version of the full game to stop waiting and jump into running your Rent A Car Bussiness already. Don't forget to wishlist the full game version to continue your most fun Rent A Car experience.

In Rent A Car Simulator 24, you start your car rental business by renting a single car and build a fleet of dozens of luxury cars. Each car will bring you daily income.
Modify and repair cars to earn more.

Buy new cars and grow your car rental business.

You can drive your cars and speed up the road with them.

Prologue Version Main Features:


  • Renting your cars to customers and tracking their rental status.
  • Buy new cars and grow your car rental business.
  • Earn income by selling your cars.
  • You can repair cars.
  • You have a living map. There are in-game characters around with whom you can engage in dialogue.
